mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS_CRT_SISZ2_BI( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, NAME, DOCUMENT_NO, GENDER, REGISTERE_STATUS, INSURANCE_NO, CURRENT_STATUS, START_DATE, INSURE_PAY, FACT_INSURE_PAY, LAST_UNIT_NAME, UNIT_TYPE, UNIT_PERSON_COUNT, PLURALITY_COUNT, ENDOWMENT_STATE, HOSPITAL_STATE, HOSPITAL_CATEGORY, BEARING_STATE, INJURE_STATE, IDLENESS_STATE, ENDOWMENT_AMOUNT, HOSPITAL_AMOUNT, INFO_DATE, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{name}, #{documentNo}, #{gender}, #{registeredStatus}, #{insuranceNo}, #{currentStatus}, #{startDate}, #{insurePay}, #{factInsurePay}, #{lastUnitName}, #{unitType}, #{unitPersonCount}, #{pluralityCount}, #{endowmentState}, #{hospitalState}, #{hospitalCategory}, #{bearingState}, #{injureState}, #{idlenessState}, #{endowmentAmount}, #{hospitalAmount}, #{infoDate}, #{appId} )
